title: Tribute to Norm Macdonald, Last TRUE Hero in the War on Comedy & Free Speech
description:
Today, we remember Norm Macdonald, the last hero in the war on comedy and a guardian of free speech. Crowder reflects on Macdonald's best SNL moments and jokes from over the years.

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/
